segments.text: Isabelle , you know I'm not interested in fame .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you don't seem to be interested in getting a real job , either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know I'm interested in teaching . I'm looking for jazz students ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , and every high school student in town is banging on your door , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know they're out there . I'll find them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're such a dreamer ! You think that you can spread the word of jazz in an underpass ?
segments.speaker: S2
